scripts.dev: concurrently -n api,web -c green,blue --kill-others --kill-others-on-fail "npm run dev:api" "npm run dev:web"
scripts.build:web: npm run build:shared && npm run build -w @farm-erp/web
scripts.typecheck:web: npm run build:shared && cd apps/web && npx tsc --noEmit
scripts.clean: npm run clean:shared && npm run clean:web
